title: Why XTONE
description: Guarantee of quality and exclusivity from the sintered mineral compact surfaces and natural stone on for large format surfaces.

largeFormat.title: Large format
largeFormat.description: The format is no longer a constraint and allows for greater continuity and visual aesthetics in spaces. The surfaces adapt to any environment and application, becoming an option of extraordinary versatility.

thickness.title: Thickness
thickness.description: The variety of different thicknesses in 3 (only XLight), 6, 12 and 20 millimetres allow the large-format surfaces to be classified according to the type of application for which they are destined. Wall, floor, furniture or kitchen worktops are some of the options.

largeFormat.title: Large format
largeFormat.description: More natural, exclusive and luxurious environments relive through large-format natural surfaces. Natural stone becomes a limitless option for its application in any type of projects.

thickness.title: Thickness
thickness.description: The different thicknesses that natural stone presents in 20 and 30 millimeters allow the large-format surfaces to be classified according to the type of application to which they are destined. Wall, floor or kitchen countertops are some of the options.

1.title: 100% natural and reciclable
1.description: Durable surfaces made out of materials that can be completely reused after their life cycle.

2.title: Waterproof
2.description: It prevents the absorption of liquids and the accumulation of odours thanks to its low porosity.

3.title: Hygienic
3.description: Low emission of volatile organic compounds, allowing direct contact with foodstuffs.

4.title: Scratch and impact resistant
4.description: High tolerance to energy from impacts and cutting tools used on the surface.

5.title: Resistant to ice and frost
5.description: Stable to sudden temperature changes, it withstands extreme cold conditions.

6.title: Fire resistant
6.description: It maintains its aspect and performance when exposed to high temperatures.

7.title: UV resistant
7.description: Unalterable by ultraviolet rays, it remains stable against wear and tear due to strong illumination.

8.title: Abrasion resistant
8.description: High durability and good resistance to wear and tear and scratches from daily use.

9.title: Chemical and stain resistant
9.description: Unalterable to household chemicals and high resistance to any type of stains.

10.title: Easy to clean
10.description: The use of specific products is unnecessary thanks to the zero-effort care of the material.

environment.description: Respect for the environment, sustainability and the reuse of resources are the key elements from the Porcelanosa Grupo philosophy.
